comments.text:
All of the fields from that `metrics.yaml` file are missing from the metrics schema.

File: https://github.com/mozilla/application-services/blob/master/components/places/android/metrics.yaml

It needs to be added as a dependency in the repositories.yaml file in Mozilla-schema-generator.
comments.author: fbertsch@mozilla.com
comments.creator: fbertsch@mozilla.com
